mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.work_priority_all_mst( priority_all_cd, company_cd, author_cd, priority_all_nm, priority_order_cd) values(#{priorityAllCd}, #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '', #{priorityOrderCd})

insert into planocycle.work_priority_all_shelfs( priority_all_cd, company_cd, author_cd, shelf_patten_cd) values
(#{priorityAllCd}, #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list})
mapper.select: select priority_all_cd, priority_all_name,create_time,author_cd from planocycle.priority_all_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteflg=0 and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by priority_all_cd desc

select shelfnm.shelf_name,shelf.shelf_pattern_cd,shelf.shelf_pattern_name ,count(distinct tana.tai_cd) as tai_cnt,count(tana.tana_cd) as tana_cnt ,case when allshelf.shelf_patten_cd is not null then 1 else 0 end as checkFlag from planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst shelf left join planocycle.work_priority_all_shelfs allshelf on allshelf.priority_all_cd = #{priorityAllCd} and allshelf.company_cd = shelf.company_cd and allshelf.shelf_patten_cd = shelf.shelf_pattern_cd inner join planocycle.shelf_name_mst shelfnm on shelf.shelf_name_cd = shelfnm.id inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data pts on shelf.shelf_pattern_cd = pts.shelf_pattern_cd inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data_taimst tai on pts.id = tai.pts_cd inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data_tanamst tana on tai.pts_cd = tana.pts_cd and tai.tai_cd = tana.tai_cd where shelf.company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by shelfnm.shelf_name,shelf.shelf_pattern_cd,shelf.shelf_pattern_name,allshelf.shelf_patten_cd order by shelf.shelf_pattern_cd
